description:
The OSAPI v1.1 server snapshot 'createImage' action should limit the number of image metadata items based on the configured quota.allowed_metadata_items that is set.

Currently a POST to /servers/<id>/action for 'createImage' would allow an arbitrarily large amount of image metadata to be specified.
title: OSAPI v1.1 server snapshot action should limit image metadata per quota
